title: Build
effect_text: Perform a **Build** action.

title: Move (Level 1)
effect_text: **Move**. Move up to 1 space.

title: Move (Level 2)
effect_text: **Move**. Move up to 2 spaces.

title: Buy Card
effect_text: Perform a **Buy Card** action.

title: Main Action
effect_text: Perform your House's **Main Action**.

title: Auxiliary Action
effect_text: Perform your House's **Auxiliary Action**.

title: Master Builder
effect_text: **Build**. If you build, the cost is reduced by 1 Basic Resource of your choice.

title: Forced March
effect_text: **Move**. Move up to 3 spaces.

title: Wholesale
effect_text: **Buy Card**. Gain 2 Food before buying.

title: Veteran's Command
effect_text: **Main Action**. Treat your relevant building level as +1 for this action.

title: Field Logistics
effect_text: **Auxiliary Action**. Draw 1 card after performing the action.

title: Double Duty
effect_text: Perform **two different** actions: Build, Move (up to 2 spaces), or Buy Card.

title: Improvise
effect_text: Copy the action of a card played by a neighbor this round.

title: Reinforce
effect_text: **Build**. You may build/upgrade even if you are not on the tile (must be adjacent).

title: Expedition
effect_text: **Move**. Move up to 5 spaces.

title: Grand Maneuver
effect_text: **Main Action**. You may perform this action twice.

title: Omnipotence
effect_text: Perform **any** one action (Build, Move up to 6 spaces, Buy, Main, or Aux). Then draw 1 card.

title: Heroic Inspiration
effect_text: **Main Action**. All other players may immediately draw 1 card.

title: Time Warp
effect_text: **Auxiliary Action**. Take another turn immediately after this one (play 1 card only).

title: Unified Front
effect_text: **Buy Card**. The card you buy goes directly into your hand.

title: Architect's Dream
effect_text: **Build**. This build costs 0 Resources (Level 1 or 2 only).
